title: Deployment with Tolerations
description: Create a Deployment named ||taint-deploy|| in namespace ||mars|| with ||3|| replicas using image ||nginx:stable-alpine|| that tolerates taint ||zone=restricted:PreferNoSchedule||.

steps: kubectl create deployment taint-deploy --image=nginx:stable-alpine --replicas=3 -n mars --dry-run=client -o yaml > deploy.yaml
2. Add tolerations to pod template spec:

validations.command: kubectl get deployment taint-deploy -n mars -o jsonpath='{.spec.replicas}'
